title: 177. The American Mandate
itunes:title: 177. The American Mandate
description: If we don’t have freedom, we don’t have anything. In today’s episode, Andy talks about the real American mandate that we should implement to protect the freedom and the future of America and the 3 practical daily steps we need to take as our obligation towards the greatest country on earth.
